title: Ryze rework has a bug on W
body:
If someone walks out of W range as it casts (There is a half a second cast time), ryze will stutter step and not cast the ability.

This is pretty annoying, and is probably a large contribution to his winrate atm, because it makes his root very unreliable.

replies.body: True... I tried this alot of times against Zed and LeBlanc and it's pretty anoying since it can destroy your combo with passive and in the worst cases it can loose a teamfight.
